author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Khawaja blocked from wearing symbol of peace on bat, shoes by ICC
text:
Summary by Ground News Usman Khawaja's application to have a symbol of peace on his shoes and bat has been rejected by the International Cricket Council. The Australian opener had hoped to display a sticker of a black dove with an olive branch to pay respect to the lives lost in Gaza for the Boxing Day Test against Pakistan. He even wore shoes with the design during a training session prior to the fixture. Share menu More
